Type.Name: FileWebRequest

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FileWebRequest extends System.Net.WebRequest implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

remarks.para: The class implements the abstract base class for Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) that use the file:// scheme to request local files.
Do not use the constructor. Use the method to initialize new instances of the class. If the URI scheme is file://, the method returns a object.
The method makes a synchronous request for the file specified in the property and returns a object that contains the response. You can make an asynchronous request for the file using the and methods.
When you want to write data to a file, the method returns a instance to write to. The and methods provide asynchronous access to the write data stream.
The class relies on the class for error handling and code access security.

summary.para: Provides a file system implementation of the class.

remarks.para: The method cancels a request to a resource. After a request is canceled, calling the , , , , , or method causes a with the property set to .
Note This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. For more information, see [<topic://conUsingNetworkTracing>].

summary.para: Cancels a request to an Internet resource.

MemberSignature.Value: public override IAsyncResult BeginGetRequestStream (AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginGetRequestStream(class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed

remarks.para: The method starts an asynchronous request for a stream used to send data to a file system resource. The callback method that implements the delegate uses the method to return the request stream.

summary.para: Begins an asynchronous request for a object to use to write data.

returns.para: An that references the asynchronous request.

Docs.param: An object that contains state information for this request.

returns.para: An that references the asynchronous request.

Docs.param: An object that contains state information for this request.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ContentType { get; set; }

Docs.value: To be added: an object of type 'string'

remarks.para: The property contains the media type of the data being sent. This is typically the MIME encoding of the content. The property is currently not used by the class.

summary.para: Gets or sets the content type of the data being sent. This property is reserved for future use.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Net.ICredentials Credentials { get; set; }
.property instance class System.Net.ICredentials Credentials

Docs.value: To be added: an object of type 'ICredentials'

remarks.para: Because the class does not authenticate requests for files from the local file system, it ignores the contents, if any, of the property. Authentication for is handled by the access control lists for the file resource in the underlying file system.

summary.para: Gets or sets the credentials that are associated with this request. This property is reserved for future use.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.IO.Stream EndGetRequestStream (IAsyncResult asyncResult);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.IO.Stream EndGetRequestStream(class System.IAsyncResult asyncResult) cil managed

remarks.para: The method completes an asynchronous stream request that was started by the method.

block.para: To avoid timing issues with garbage collection, be sure to close the response stream by calling the method on the stream returned by the method after calling the method.

summary.para: Ends an asynchronous request for a instance that the application uses to write data.

returns.para: A object that the application uses to write data.

Docs.param: An that references the pending request for a stream.

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Net.WebResponse EndGetResponse(class System.IAsyncResult asyncResult) cil managed

remarks.para: The method completes an asynchronous request for a file system resource that was started with the method.

summary.para: Ends an asynchronous request for a file system resource.

returns.para: A that contains the response from the file system resource.

Docs.param: An that references the pending request for a response.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Timeout { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Timeout

Docs.value: To be added: an object of type 'int'

remarks.para: A Domain Name System (DNS) query may take up to 15 seconds to return or time out. If your request contains a host name that requires resolution and you set to a value less than 15 seconds, it may take 15 seconds or more before a is thrown to indicate a time-out on your request.

summary.para: Gets or sets the length of time until the request times out.
